metadata.dc:title: Trent University Library Historical Aerial Photography - OMNRF
metadata.dc:contributor: Maps, Data and Government Information Centre (MaDGIC), Trent University Library
Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry (OMNRF)
metadata.dc:publisher: Maps, Data and Government Information Centre (MaDGIC), Trent University Library
metadata.dc:creator: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry
metadata.dc:description: Historical black and white aerial photography covering areas of south central Ontario with a focus on Peterborough County and surrounding area. Capture dates range from 1969 to 1993 at varying scales. The physical photos were scanned to 16-bit greyscale TIFF images and georeferenced by the Maps, Data and Government Information Centre of Trent University Library using the North American Datum (NAD83)
metadata.dcterms:rights: Photos available for download by registered members of Trent University
metadata.dcterms:rightsHolder: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry
metadata.dcterms:spatial: Spatial coverage is concentrated around Peterborough County and surrounding areas, with intermittent coverage extending south to Northumberland County, west into the Regional Municipality of Durham, and east into Quinte West
